casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Leonard HARDY. No. 260P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 30, 2015. Hannah Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hardy, Leonard. Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. C. Branson Vickery, III, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of July 2015 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Writ of Supersedeas:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of July 2015."
